/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings and skyscrapers that line the street. These structures, predominantly gray and white, rise high into the light blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of clouds. 

The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On either side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
